anya-e0105n19:1_0: Ekacce pana marammaraṭṭhikā ‘‘ācariyabuddhaghoso marammaraṭṭhe sathuṁ nāma nagarato sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo akāsī’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n19:1_1: Taṁ dhammānandena anujānitvā ‘‘tampi thokaṁ yuttisampannaṁ, ahaṁ evaṁ saddahāmi ‘buddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe telaṅgajātiko’ti, telaṅgajātikā ca bahū janā marammaraṭṭhe ca indocina raṭṭhe ca gantvā vasanti, talhiṅa?
anya-e0105n19:1_2: Iti vohāro ca tatoyeva telaṅgapadato uppanno.
anya-e0105n19:1_3: Tathā ‘buddhaghoso aṭṭhakathāyo katvā sīhaḷadīpato marammaraṭṭhaṁ gantvā pacchimabhāge tattheva vasī’tipi gahetuṁ sakkā, tassa hi ganthā marammaraṭṭhe sīhaḷaraṭṭhatopi surakkhitatarā hontī’’ti ca vatvā patiṭṭhāpitaṁ.
